metadata.title: CVE-2017-18265 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Prosody before 0.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash), related to an incompatibility with certain versions ofthe LuaSocket library, such as the lua-socket package from Debian stretch.The attacker needs to trigger a stream error. A crash can be observed in,for example, the c2s module.

criterions.comment: prosody: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
